TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class StringComparer : System.Collections.Generic.IComparer<string>, System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer<string>, System.Collections.IComparer, System.Collections.IEqualityComparer

.class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit StringComparer extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1<string>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1<string>, class System.Collections.IComparer, class System.Collections.IEqualityComparer
Public MustInherit Class StringComparer Implements IComparer, IComparer(Of String), IEqualityComparer, IEqualityComparer(Of String)

public ref class StringComparer abstract : System::Collections::Generic::IComparer<System::String ^>, System::Collections::Generic::IEqualityComparer<System::String ^>, System::Collections::IComparer, System::Collections::IEqualityComparer
type StringComparer = class interface IComparer interface IEqualityComparer interface IComparer<string> interface IEqualityComparer<string>

summary.span: Represents a string comparison operation that uses specific case and culture-based or ordinal comparison rules.

span.span: Represents a string comparison operation that uses specific case and culture-based or ordinal comparison rules.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件衍生自類別意字串為基礎的比較、 等號和列入考量這兩個大小寫和文化特性的比較規則的雜湊程式碼作業。An object derived from the class embodies string-based comparison, equality, and hash code operations that take into account both case and culture-specific comparison rules. 您可以使用類別以建立特定類型的比較，來排序的泛型集合中的項目。You can use the class to create a type-specific comparison to sort the elements in a generic collection. 之類的類別， ， ，和使用排序用途的類別。Classes such as , , , and use the class for sorting purposes. 比對作業，由區分大小寫或區分大小寫，並使用其中一個文字 （區分文化特性） 定義類別或序數 （不區分文化特性） 比較規則。A comparison operation that is represented by the class is defined to be either case-sensitive or case-insensitive, and use either word (culture-sensitive) or ordinal (culture-insensitive) comparison rules. 如需 word 和序數比較規則的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about word and ordinal comparison rules, see . ## 實作的屬性Implemented Properties 您可能會混淆有關如何使用因為紓解矛盾類別內容。You might be confused about how to use the class properties because of a seeming contradiction. 類別宣告`abstract`(`MustInherit`在 Visual Basic 中)，這表示它的成員可以叫用的類別，衍生自物件上類別。The class is declared `abstract` (`MustInherit` in Visual Basic), which means its members can be invoked only on an object of a class derived from the class. 在於每一個屬性的矛盾類別宣告`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，這表示此屬性可以叫用不需要先建立衍生的類別。The contradiction is that each property of the class is declared `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), which means the property can be invoked without first creating a derived class. 您可以呼叫屬性直接因為每個屬性實際上會傳回衍生自匿名類別的執行個體類別。You can call a property directly because each property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class that is derived from the class. 因此，每個屬性值的型別是，這不是匿名類別的基底類別的匿名型別類別。Consequently, the type of each property value is , which is the base class of the anonymous class, not the type of the anonymous class itself. 每個類別屬性會傳回支援預先定義的大小寫和比較規則的物件。Each class property returns a object that supports predefined case and comparison rules. ## Examples 下列範例會示範屬性和方法類別。The following example demonstrates the properties and the method of the class. 此範例將說明不同物件排序的三個版本的英文字母 I。The example illustrates how different objects sort three versions of the Latin letter I. [!code-cpp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cpp/omni.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cs/omni.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/vb/omni.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets a object that performs a case-sensitive string comparison using the word comparison rules of the current culture.

span.span: Gets a object that performs a case-sensitive string comparison using the word comparison rules of the current culture.
A new object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回字串是語言相關時，就可以使用屬性。The returned by the property can be used when strings are linguistically relevant. 例如，如果字串顯示給使用者，或是字串都是使用者互動的結果，區分文化特性的字串比較應該用於排序的字串資料。For example, if strings are displayed to the user, or if strings are the result of user interaction, culture-sensitive string comparison should be used to order the string data. 目前的文化特性是與目前執行緒相關聯的物件。The current culture is the object associated with the current thread. 屬性實際上會傳回衍生自匿名類別的執行個體類別。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class. 每次呼叫屬性`get`存取子會傳回新物件一般，如下列程式碼所示。Each call to the property `get` accessor returns a new object, as the following code shows. [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer.CurrentCulture#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer.CurrentCulture/cs/CompareObjects.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer.CurrentCulture#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer.CurrentCulture/vb/CompareObjects.vb#1)] 若要改善效能，您可以儲存本機變數中的物件，而不是擷取的值屬性多次。To improve performance, you can store the object in a local variable rather than retrieve the value of the property multiple times. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性和方法類別。The following code example demonstrates the properties and the method of the class. 此範例將說明不同物件排序的三個版本的英文字母 I。The example illustrates how different objects sort three versions of the Latin letter I. [!code-cpp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cpp/omni.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cs/omni.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/vb/omni.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets a object that performs case-insensitive string comparisons using the word comparison rules of the current culture.

span.span: Gets a object that performs case-insensitive string comparisons using the word comparison rules of the current culture.
A new object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的文化特性是與目前執行緒相關聯的物件。The current culture is the object associated with the current thread. 傳回字串是語言相關，但兩者的大小寫不是時，就可以使用屬性。The returned by the property can be used when strings are linguistically relevant but their case is not. 例如，如果字串顯示給使用者，但案例是並不重要，區分文化特性，不區分大小寫字串比較應該用於排序的字串資料。For example, if strings are displayed to the user but case is unimportant, culture-sensitive, case-insensitive string comparison should be used to order the string data. 屬性實際上會傳回衍生自匿名類別的執行個體類別。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class. 每次呼叫屬性`get`存取子會傳回新物件一般，如下列程式碼所示。Each call to the property `get` accessor returns a new object, as the following code shows. [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer.CurrentCulture#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer.CurrentCulture/cs/CompareObjects.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer.CurrentCulture#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer.CurrentCulture/vb/CompareObjects.vb#2)] 若要改善效能，您可以儲存本機變數中的物件，而不是擷取的值屬性多次。To improve performance, you can store the object in a local variable rather than retrieve the value of the property multiple times.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為執行階段不需要進行 unbox 處理`x`或`y`如果它們是實值類型，或是嘗試向下轉型為`x`或`y`如果它們都是參考類型的字串方法可能會稍微更有效率方法。Because the runtime does not have to unbox `x` or `y` if they are value types or attempt to downcast `x` or `y` to strings if they are reference types, the method may be slightly more efficient than the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是更有效率方法因為`obj`參數沒有可執行的作業進行 unboxed 處理。The method is more efficient than the method because the `obj` parameter does not have to be unboxed to perform the operation. 方法配置的大小成正比的記憶體數量`obj`來計算的雜湊碼`obj`。The method allocates an amount of memory that is proportional to the size of `obj` to calculate the hash code of `obj`. 如果很大的字串是嘗試擷取雜湊程式碼可能會擲回。In the case of large strings, trying to retrieve the hash code can throw an . 相反地，您可以使用替代演算法配置固定的記憶體數量，計算雜湊碼時。Instead, you can use an alternate algorithm that allocates a fixed amount of memory when calculating hash codes. 若要使用此演算法，加入[< NetFx45_CultureAwareComparerGetHashCode_LongStrings >](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx45-cultureawarecomparergethashcode-longstrings-element.md)元素[\<執行階段 >](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md)您的應用程式組態檔區段。To use this algorithm, add the [](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx45-cultureawarecomparergethashcode-longstrings-element.md) element to the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md) section of your application's configuration file.

exception.span: Not enough memory is available to allocate the buffer that is required to compute the hash code.

span.span: Not enough memory is available to allocate the buffer that is required to compute the hash code.

summary.span: Gets a object that performs a case-sensitive string comparison using the word comparison rules of the invariant culture.

span.span: Gets a object that performs a case-sensitive string comparison using the word comparison rules of the invariant culture.
A new object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回屬性會以語言相關的方式，來比較字串，但不適合在任何特定的文化特性中顯示。The returned by the property compares strings in a linguistically relevant manner, but it is not suitable for display in any particular culture. 其主要的應用程式是順序字串跨文化特性會與相同的方式。Its major application is to order strings in a way that will be identical across cultures. 而異的文化特性是所傳回物件屬性。The invariant culture is the object returned by the property. 屬性實際上會傳回衍生自匿名類別的執行個體類別。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性和方法類別。The following code example demonstrates the properties and the method of the class. 此範例將說明不同物件排序的三個版本的英文字母 I。The example illustrates how different objects sort three versions of the Latin letter I. [!code-cpp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cpp/omni.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cs/omni.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/vb/omni.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets a object that performs a case-insensitive string comparison using the word comparison rules of the invariant culture.

span.span: Gets a object that performs a case-insensitive string comparison using the word comparison rules of the invariant culture.
A new object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回屬性比較字串中語言相關的方式，會忽略大小寫，但不適合在任何特定的文化特性中顯示。The returned by the property compares strings in a linguistically relevant manner that ignores case, but it is not suitable for display in any particular culture. 其主要的應用程式是順序字串跨文化特性會與相同的方式。Its major application is to order strings in a way that will be identical across cultures. 而異的文化特性是所傳回物件屬性。The invariant culture is the object returned by the property. 屬性實際上會傳回衍生自匿名類別的執行個體類別。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public static StringComparer Ordinal { get; }
.property class System.StringComparer Ordinal
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Ordinal As StringComparer
public: static property StringComparer ^ Ordinal { StringComparer ^ get(); };
member this.Ordinal : StringComparer

summary.span: Gets a object that performs a case-sensitive ordinal string comparison.

span.span: Gets a object that performs a case-sensitive ordinal string comparison.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回屬性執行與語言無關的簡單全半形比較。The returned by the property performs a simple byte comparison that is independent of language. 比較字串時，會產生以程式設計方式或當比較區分大小寫的資源，例如密碼時，這是最適合。This is most appropriate when comparing strings that are generated programmatically or when comparing case-sensitive resources such as passwords. 屬性實際上會傳回衍生自匿名類別的執行個體類別。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性和方法類別。The following code example demonstrates the properties and the method of the class. 此範例將說明不同物件排序的三個版本的英文字母 I。The example illustrates how different objects sort three versions of the Latin letter I. [!code-cpp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cpp/omni.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cs/omni.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/vb/omni.vb#1)]

.property class System.StringComparer OrdinalIgnoreCase
Public Shared ReadOnly Property OrdinalIgnoreCase As StringComparer
public: static property StringComparer ^ OrdinalIgnoreCase { StringComparer ^ get(); };
member this.OrdinalIgnoreCase : StringComparer

summary.span: Gets a object that performs a case-insensitive ordinal string comparison.

span.span: Gets a object that performs a case-insensitive ordinal string comparison.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回屬性中的字串比較它們已轉換成大寫使用慣例的文化特性而異，會將這些字元，然後執行 無關的簡單全半形比較語言。The returned by the property treats the characters in the strings to compare as if they were converted to uppercase using the conventions of the invariant culture, and then performs a simple byte comparison that is independent of language. 比較字串時，會產生以程式設計方式或當比較不區分大小寫的資源，例如路徑和檔名時，這是最適合。This is most appropriate when comparing strings that are generated programmatically or when comparing case-insensitive resources such as paths and filenames. 屬性實際上會傳回衍生自匿名類別的執行個體類別。The property actually returns an instance of an anonymous class derived from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性和方法類別。The following code example demonstrates the properties and the method of the class. 此範例將說明不同物件排序的三個版本的英文字母 I。The example illustrates how different objects sort three versions of the Latin letter I. [!code-cpp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cpp/omni.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/cs/omni.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StringComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.StringComparer/vb/omni.vb#1)]
